thread.title: Dilsy Villeda

author: Dilsy Villeda
title: Dilsy Villeda
text: You know is working when it hurts but OUCH, WOW you can see the results. I've experience laser without any pain reliever but by putting ice just before the laser is less painful. Ice should be offer after the first treatment, since each treatment is much stronger. The pain isn't irresistible but in some parts really hurts a lot and if you have a way to make it less painful then why not?
